text: Ara agera dina yara tara mata ha'oyara kamana karechila, tara balate lagala, ‘dekhale to, allah‌ tamra bandadera madhye yara jan'ya icche tara riphika bariye dena ebam yara jan'ya icche kamiye dena. Yadi allah‌ amadera prati sadaya na hatena, tabe amaderake'o tini bhugarbhe prothita karatena. Dekhale to! Kapherara saphalakama haya na [1].’
